absolute.description: Applies position: absolute to the content element.
absolute.description_zh: 将 position： absolute 应用于 content 元素。

activator.description_zh: 显式设置叠加层的激活器。

activator-props.description: Apply custom properties to the activator.
activator-props.description_zh: 将自定义属性应用于激活器。

attach.description: Specifies which DOM element the overlay content should teleport to. Can be a direct element reference, querySelector string, or true to disable teleporting. Uses body by default.
attach.description_zh: 指定覆盖内容应传送到哪个 DOM 元素。可以是直接元素引用、querySelector 字符串或 true，以禁用传送。默认使用 body。

close-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before closing component. Only applies to hover and focus events.
close-delay.description_zh: 关闭组件之前等待的毫秒数。仅适用于悬停和焦点事件。

close-on-back.description: Closes the overlay content when the browser’s back button is pressed or $router.back() is called, cancelling the original navigation. persistent overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.
close-on-back.description_zh: 在按下浏览器的后退按钮或调用 $router.back（） 时关闭覆盖内容，从而取消原始导航。永久叠加将取消导航并制作动画，就像在外部单击而不是关闭一样。

close-on-content-click.description: Closes component when you click on its content.
close-on-content-click.description_zh: 单击组件内容时关闭组件。

contained.description: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies absolute and attach. (Note: The parent element must have position: relative.).
contained.description_zh: 将零部件和纱布的大小限制为其偏移父级。暗示 absolute 和 attach。（注意：父元素必须具有 position： relative。

content-class.description: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the v-app component (unless the attach prop is provided) and is not targetable by classes passed directly on the component.
content-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于分离的元素。这很有用，因为内容被移动到 v-app 组件的开头（除非提供了 attach 属性），并且不能被直接在组件上传递的类所定位。

content-props.description: Apply custom properties to the content.
content-props.description_zh: 将自定义属性应用于内容。

disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
disabled.description_zh: 删除单击组件或定位组件的功能。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制组件的内容在挂载时呈现。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，并且您希望为 SEO 抓取，这将非常有用。

height.description: Sets the height for the component.

location.description: Specifies the anchor point for positioning the component, using directional cues to align it either horizontally, vertically, or both…
location.description_zh: 指定用于定位组件的锚点，使用方向提示将其水平对齐、垂直对齐或两者对齐......

location-strategy.description: A function used to specifies how the component should position relative to its activator.
location-strategy.description_zh: 用于指定组件相对于其激活器的位置的函数。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。如果 component 支持 multiple prop，则默认为空数组。

no-click-animation.description: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of the content element when using the persistent prop.
no-click-animation.description_zh: 在使用 persistent prop 时，在内容元素外部单击时禁用弹跳效果。

offset.description: A single value that offsets content away from the target based upon what side it is on.
offset.description_zh: 一个值，该值根据内容所在的一侧将内容从目标偏移。

open-delay.description: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only applies to hover and focus events.
open-delay.description_zh: 打开组件之前等待的毫秒数。仅适用于悬停和焦点事件。

open-on-click.description: Activate the component when the activator is clicked.
open-on-click.description_zh: 单击激活器时激活组件。

open-on-focus.description: Activate the component when the activator is focused.
open-on-focus.description_zh: 当激活器聚焦时激活组件。

open-on-hover.description: Activate the component when the activator is hovered.
open-on-hover.description_zh: 将鼠标悬停在激活器上时激活组件。

origin.description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for transition origin.
origin.description_zh: 设置元素上的过渡原点。您可以在 transition origin 的 MDN 文档上找到更多信息。

persistent.description: Clicking outside of the element or pressing esc key will not deactivate it.
persistent.description_zh: 单击元素外部或按 Esc 键不会将其停用。

scrim.description: Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.
scrim.description_zh: 接受 true/false 以启用背景，接受 string 以定义颜色。

scroll-strategy.description: Strategy used when the component is activate and user scrolls.
scroll-strategy.description_zh: 当组件处于 activate 状态且用户滚动时使用的策略。

target.description: For locationStrategy=“connected”, specify an element or array of x,y coordinates that the overlay should position itself relative to. This will be the activator element by default.
target.description_zh: 对于 locationStrategy=“connected”，指定叠加层应相对于其定位自身的 x，y 坐标的元素或数组。默认情况下，这将是 activator 元素。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 设置零部件过渡。可以是内置或自定义过渡之一。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

z-index.description: The z-index used for the component.

events.name: afterEnter
events.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

events.name: afterLeave
events.description: Event that fires after the overlay has finished transitioning out.
events.description_zh: 在叠加完成过渡后触发的事件。

events.name: click:outside
events.description: Event that fires when clicking outside an active overlay.
events.description_zh: 在活动叠加层外部单击时触发的事件。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: activator
slots.description: When used, will activate the component when clicked (or hover for specific components). This manually stops the event propagation. Without this slot, if you open the component through its model, you will need to manually stop the event propagation.
slots.description_zh: 使用时，将在单击时激活组件（或将鼠标悬停在特定组件上）。这将手动停止事件传播。如果没有此插槽，如果通过其模型打开组件，则需要手动停止事件传播。
